pageContent: Introduction: Although cancer treatment commonly has a negative impact on sexual functioning, sexual concerns are still largely undertreated in routine cancer care. The medical model that guides current approaches to sexual care in cancer does not adequately address key patient needs.

metaData.source:
Review: psychosocial interventions addressing sexual or relationship functioning in men with prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22458946/
